project1.title: Movies
project1.description: An app to track information about movies, create collections to watch, and rate watched movies.

project2.title: Doggie Day Care
project2.description: Allows the owner of a dog day care service to track clients and schedule dog walks.

project3.title: Hoarder
project3.description: This app tracks a collection and allows new items to be added, deleted, or viewed as single items.
project3.technologiesUsed: Routing, React, CRUD programming, Firebase, ES6

project4.title: Favorite Places
project4.description: An introduction to XHR requests and JSON, this app contains information about favorite features in favorite cities.

project5.title: capstone
project5.description: Game Night allows a group to share their collections of board games and plan gaming meetups.
project5.technologiesUsed: Routing, React, CRUD programming, Firebase, ES6

project6.title: Temperature Converter
project6.description: A simple app that converts temperatures from Fahrenheit to Celsius and vice versa.
